title: Caterpillar Rhyme Time: Back Yard Nature Kids
description: Caterpillar Rhyme Time is a myriad of colorful, hairy, scary, curly cue, and unusual caterpillars in vivid color photos set to a rhyming poem. Meet the woolly bear caterpillar and his weather predictions, a black and yellow Eastern Tiger Swallowtail butterfly perched on someone's finger, along with moths, dogs, and a cocoon. Color words include: green, orange, red, yellow, black, white.Facts are fun when they're in a story, and your child will learn that the lime green and brown Saddleback Caterpillar can sting, and the very pretty White Marked Tussock Moth caterpillar can give you a rash.Caterpillars include a bright orange gulf fritillary caterpillar with black spines, a tri-colored striped caterpillar with a lemon yellow underbelly, a spiny black caterpillar, a lime green and brown unicorn caterpillar, a bagworm with its bag, an orange owlet caterpillar with bizarre curly cue appendages, a fuzzy white caterpillar, and everybody's favorite, the Woolly Bear.Every page in Caterpillar Rhyme Time is a full color photograph with the line of a poem as a caption.49 story pages â€” suitable for kids of ages 3 to 8.
author: Della Rose
